wayowruddha kalakaruwanta upakara kirima sandaha eksath prawruththi pathra aayathanaya aramudalak pihituwimata thiranaya kara athi bawa sabhapathi bandula padmakumara mahatha pawasayi.sarasawiya puwathpatha ha silumina puwathpathe “rasanduna” athirekaye sahayogaya da labaganimin, eksath prawruththi pathra aayathanaye (lekhawus mudal) mudalwalin mulika aramudalak wenkota me aramudala pihituwana bawa da sabhapathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.upakara kala yuthu mattame wayowruddha kalakaruwan rasak sitina athara, ewani aya wenuwen yam mehewarak itukirimata haki we nam eya wadath yahapath katayuththak wana bawa da sabhapathiwaraya sandahan kaleya.

onna dan tharage patangaththalu..
